part.title: Main
part.ingredient: 4 TBsp crumbled blue cheese or feta ( whatever is available in your fridge)
part.step: Sprinkle spinach leaves on a platter, then cranberries and walnuts.
Gently crushing the walnuts in your hands as you sprinkle.
Drizzle over dressing and then top with crumbled cheese on top.

part.title: Dressing
part.ingredient: 1 TBsp champagne or white wine vinegar
part.step: Put all dressing ingredients in a small jar with a lid.
Give it a good shake and set aside.
